body_html:
It works for me, but you have to specify the version so that it won't pick 9.1 automatically. Steps:

  1. apt-cache show cuda | grep Version
  2. Write down the full 9.0.? version
  3. apt-get install cuda=FULL-VERSION-CODE

Also, make sure to run apt-get update before any of this, after you download the installer for 9.0.
